identifier: Washington Post best new restaurants DC|washingtonpost.com
content: The 26 top new restaurants in the D.C. area include Pastis, Moon Rabbit, Pascual, Bar Del Monte, Maple Room, Chay, El Presidente, Cielo Rojo
D.C.'s best new restaurants feature a Middle Eastern gem, Mission-style burritos and an ode to Afro-Caribbean cuisine.
Tom Sietsema's list includes familiar and fresh faces on the Washington dining scene.
Buzzy newcomers Bad Saint, the Dabney and Tail Up Goat are among the 50 eateries getting nods around the country.
Tom Sietsema's 25 favorite new restaurants in the Washington region offer a world of flavors.
